name: Corpse Party: BloodCovered (Fan Made Visual Novel)
name_original: Corpse Party: BloodCovered (Fan Made Visual Novel)
description:
CORPSE PARTY RETURNS

This is a fangame created by MadnessWay Games, in which you can play a remake of the PSP game Corpse Party: BloodCovered, but in visual novel style.
I do not own Corpse Party trademark. This is just a freeware for Corpse Party fans.

Plot

A group of high school students perform a charm -Sachiko Ever After- that transports them to a cursed school called Heavenly Host. Discover the insides of this school while you try to escape. Who will survive?

Features (full game)
  • 8+ hours of content
  • Japanese voice acting
  • CGs, characters and backgrounds from the original games
  • Wrong endings!
  • Some Extra Chapters ^^

There's a demo available while the other chapters  are finished. This demo includes the first chapter with all its wrong endings.
